Name: N/D
Job/Team Function:
Head of Crisis and Commitments
‘Head Defence Commitments & Crisis (Hd Cts) is responsible for executing the Single Tasking Authority for Defence, on behalf of the Deputy Chief of Defence Staff (Military Strategy and Operations) ((DCDS MSO)). Hd Cts provides timely military strategic advice to Ministers, the Chief of Defence Staff, DCDS(MSO) and Assistant Chief of Defence Staff (Operations & Commitments) on operational capability and Defence commitments. 

Hd Cts directs and monitors readiness across Defence, to ensure Her Majesty’s Government is prepared for planned and contingent operations. The role also oversees the Defence Commitments Management Organisation, Defence Crisis Management Centre and military aspects of UK & Counter Terrorism Operations. 

One of the key roles is to develop and inform Policy and Strategic direction, by providing subject matter expertise to Policy Directors and International Strategy teams. Hd Cts provides Security, Policy & Operations advice to DCDS (Military Capability) and single Service capability staffs, to inform capability development, prioritisation and readiness. Hd Cts is also responsible for maintaining strategic relationships with Other Government Departments, in support of Crisis response and other Defence activity.’

Head (Military) International Security is the senior military advisor leading a team of military staff to support policy professionals in the MOD to inform and deliver strategy in the Levant and North Africa, the Gulf and Iran, the Indo-Asia Pacific, Sub-Saharan Africa, Latin America, and the Caribbean. Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of Task Force KINDRED (TFK). TFK was established in March and is co-ordinating all of the Department’s military aid to Ukraine as part of our wider work on the conflict in Ukraine. TFK oversees a global search for military equipment and works with DE&S on rapid procurement. The Task Force also works closely with the Permanent Joint HQ (PJHQ) to co-ordinate the movement of UK and partner nation equipment to Ukraine. TFK is a multi-disciplinary team consisting of approx. 30 civilian and military personnel.
